gw.testharness.clustering

Class UpgradeClusterTest<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • gw.api.test.TestClass
          • gw.api.test.UnitTestClass
            • gw.testharness.clustering.ClusterTest
              • gw.testharness.clustering.UpgradeClusterTest<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITestWithMetadata, RemoteHandlerProvider<T>, junit.framework.Test

    public abstract class UpgradeClusterTest<T>
extends ClusterTest
implements RemoteHandlerProvider<T>
    Base class for upgrade tests with clustering. Handles both rolling and full upgrades. Each test method starts with a fresh environment, i.e. empty database and no running servers
